text: "Fuck the World" is a 1999 midwest hip hop song by the American Horrorcore band Insane Clown Posse and is the second single from their fifth studio album The Amazing Jeckel Brothers, which was released in 1999. The song was produced by Insane Clown Posse and Mike Clark and also written by Mike E. Clark and ICP. The song is notable for using the curse word, "fuck" 95 times even though the song claims to have said it 93 times. Insane Clown Posse to vent their anger. They were angry because Disney pressured their label, Hollywood Records, to drop them. Disney had been getting a lot of anger from the Southern Baptist Church because they had been hosting Gay Days at Disneyland. The people they cursed in the song were: Beastie Boys, the Dalai Lama, Forrest Gump, Oprah Winfrey, Kyle Petty, Tom Petty, Fred Bear, Ted Nugent, The Count of Monte Cristo, Cisco, Jack Brisco, Jerry Brisco, RMS Titanic, Celine Dion, Dionne Warwick, Berlin Wall, Lyle Lovett (claiming "Whoever the fuck that is"), Jumpsteady, Rocky Maivia, Spin, Rolling Stone, VIBE, and Violent J. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1999 songs Category:Insane Clown Posse songs
title: Fuck the World (Insane Clown Posse song)
